mapper.select: select r.*, (r.reply_good - r.reply_bad) most from (select * from reply inner join user_channel using (channel_code)) r where video_code = #{video_code} and reply_comment = 0 order by ${video_option} desc;
select * from reply where video_code = #{video_code} and reply_group = #{reply_group} and reply_comment = 1 order by reply_regdate desc
